channel.description: Recent content in assembly on Ajmal's Website

item.title: Calling Rust From C And x86 Assembly
item.description: I was curious about how FFIs (Foreign Function Interfaces) work, and how that relates to compiling code into an executable, so I decided to play with trying to call Rust code from… x86 assembly. Why? I don’t know, but it was fun and I learnt a thing or two along the way.
